\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 92369}

\subsection*{Great for Staying Awake}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{SpeedFreakkk}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2 lines &  & Methiopropamine & \\
\hline
 T+ 2:30 & 1 hit & smoked & Methiopropamine & \\
\hline
 T+ 5:00 &   & smoked & Methiopropamine & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Pharms - Diazepam & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Cannabis & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 68.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Started the night off mixing about 2 decent lines in a shot glass with water, I spent 4 hours finishing my assignment having a decent toke from the pipe about 2 and half to 3 hours in. I lost my assignment changes after the first hour and ticked so I started punching the computer desk 3-4 times before stopping to relise my hand was bleeding. 

After 4 hours I had a few tokes while setting up my DJ gear to do a one and a half hour electro/House mix.



This stuff doesnt give me the same feeling as methamphetamine does but is great if I want to stay awake for a long amount of time, it also makes me impulsive and easily angered as I normally wouldnt get that much anger over losing an hours work on my assignment.



I then took some valium and smoked a few cones to put myself to sleep, I would of had difficulty sleeping otherwise.

\end{document}
